ground_truth: She looks up to the walkway, sees Jamal, and smiles. Suddenly, Jamal notices Salim and two men sprinting on the platform towards Latika. He points behind her. She sees Salim and runs onto a waiting train. Salim finds her and pulls her off the train by her hair. He grimaces towards Jamal rushing down a flight of stairs. Then, with the other men, they manhandle the three through the crowd to the exit. Salim forces Latika into a waiting car. Jamal is still trying to weave his way through the crowds. Jamal arrives to see one thug holding a blade to Latika's face. Salim points threateningly at Jamal. The thug slices the blade across her face. He jeers at Jamal as he slams on the car window. Jamal looks on helplessly as the car speeds off into the traffic. Behind the scenes, the host walks into the toilets. Jamal sits in the cubicle. The host goes to the urinal. He leaves the toilets. Jamal exits the cubicle and approaches the sink to wash his hands. He looks at himself in the mirror and sighs. He notices at the bottom of the mirror the letter B has been written in the condensation. His jaw drops as he looks through the door. He looks puzzled as he returns to the studio floor. With a sly look, the host sees Jamal being led in by staff. Jamal sits back in his chair and stares at the host. Lights come on and illuminate the host's false smile. Jamal looks up from the screen to see a nasty grin on the host's face. Again, we see that written in the condensation. The host's face hardens suddenly. Jamal shakes his head. Again, Jamal shakes his head. The host tenses his jaw. The host looks disappointed. The host rubs his chin and shifts uncomfortably in his chair. He shakes his head. With eyebrows raised, he regards Jamal. The audience are on their feet. The director and his assistants all smile. The host gets up. He dances. He pats Jamal patronizingly on the back of his head. Then he glares at the director off-stage. The director gives him a happy thumbs up. The host maintains a grim serious expression. A smile appears fleetingly on Jamal's face as the host grins through gritted teeth. Backstage, the host waits for Jamal to leave. Jamal turns to follow the host down the corridor. He slaps him on the back then grips him by the shoulder. Two policemen stand outside the door. They cover Jamal's head in a blanket. The director approaches the host. The policemen bundle Jamal into a waiting vehicle. Srinivas is at the wheel. At the police station, the inspector and Jamal drink milky tea in glasses.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description:
She raises her gaze towards the elevated walkway above her, sees Jamal standing there, and beams with a smile. In an abrupt turn of events, Jamal suddenly becomes aware of Salim and two other men racing swiftly along the platform, heading directly towards Latika. He urgently gestures and points behind her. She turns, sees Salim, and hastily runs onto a nearby train that is waiting at the platform. However, Salim manages to locate her and forcibly drags her off the train by her hair. He casts a grimace in Jamal's direction as Jamal hurriedly makes his way down a flight of stairs. Together with the two other men, they roughly navigate the trio through the bustling crowd towards the exit. Salim forcefully pushes Latika into a nearby waiting car. Meanwhile, Jamal is still desperately trying to make his way through the throngs of people. Upon arrival, he witnesses one of the thugs menacingly holding a blade to Latika’s face. Salim gestures threateningly at Jamal. The thug cruelly slices the blade across Latika’s face. He taunts Jamal as Jamal furiously slams his hand against the car window. Jamal stands there, feeling utterly helpless, as the car accelerates and disappears into the heavy traffic.

Behind the scenes, the host makes his way into the restroom facilities. Jamal is sitting quietly inside a cubicle. The host approaches the urinals. After finishing, he exits the restroom. Jamal then emerges from his cubicle and steps over to the sink, where he proceeds to wash his hands. He pauses to look at his reflection in the mirror and lets out a sigh. Something catches his eye: the letter B written faintly in the condensation at the mirror’s bottom edge. His jaw drops in shock as he peers through the door. Looking rather bewildered, he makes his way back to the studio floor. With a sly, knowing look, the host observes Jamal being escorted in by the studio staff. Jamal returns to his seat and fixes his gaze on the host. The stage lights suddenly illuminate, casting an artificial glow on the host's insincere smile. Jamal glances up from the monitor to witness a malicious grin spreading across the host’s face. Once again, the writing in the condensation comes into view. The host's expression hardens abruptly. Jamal shakes his head in disbelief. He repeats the motion, visibly distressed. Tension builds as the host sets his jaw firmly. His face falls with disappointment. The host rubs his chin thoughtfully and shifts uncomfortably in his chair. Shaking his head, he raises his eyebrows and fixes a penetrating gaze on Jamal. The audience erupts to their feet, full of energy and enthusiasm. The director and his assistants beam with smiles. The host rises from his seat, breaking into a dance. He condescendingly pats Jamal on the back of his head. Then he casts a glare towards the director off-stage. The director responds with a cheerful thumbs-up. Maintaining a grim and serious demeanor, the host briefly allows a smile to flicker across Jamal’s face as he himself grins stiffly. Backstage, the host waits impatiently for Jamal to depart. Jamal turns to follow the host down the corridor. With a sudden gesture, the host slaps him on the back and grips him firmly by the shoulder. Two policemen are positioned outside the door. They cover Jamal’s head with a blanket, concealing his identity. The director approaches the host with intent. The policemen swiftly bundle Jamal into an awaiting vehicle. Srinivas is seated at the wheel, ready to drive. At the police station, both the inspector and Jamal sip on glasses of milky tea together.

test_cases.description:

Meanwhile, Jamal is still desperately trying to make his way through the dense throngs of people. Upon his arrival at the scene, he witnesses one of the thugs menacingly holding a sharp blade to Latika’s face. Salim gestures ominously at Jamal. The thug cruelly slices the blade across Latika’s face, leaving a mark. He taunts Jamal as Jamal furiously slams his hand against the car window in frustration and despair. Jamal stands there, feeling utterly helpless as the car accelerates quickly, disappearing into the chaotic heavy traffic.

In a different scene, behind the curtains of the show, the host makes his way into the restroom facilities. Jamal is sitting quietly inside a cubicle, lost in thought. The host approaches the urinals, finishes his business, and then exits the restroom. Jamal then emerges cautiously from his cubicle and steps over to the sink, where he proceeds to wash his hands methodically. He pauses to look at his reflection in the mirror and lets out a long sigh. Something catches his eye: the faint letter B written in the condensation at the mirror’s bottom edge. His jaw drops in shock and disbelief as he peers through the door, searching for answers. Looking rather bewildered and confused, he makes his way back to the bustling studio floor. With a sly, knowing look, the host observes Jamal being escorted in by the attentive studio staff. Jamal returns to his seat and fixes his determined gaze on the host. The stage lights suddenly illuminate, casting an artificial glow on the host's insincere and practiced smile. Jamal glances up from the monitor to witness a malicious grin spreading across the host’s face. Once again, the writing in the condensation comes into clear view. The host's expression hardens abruptly, becoming serious. Jamal shakes his head in disbelief. He repeats the motion, visibly distressed and uncertain. Tension builds in the air as the host sets his jaw firmly, his face falling with disappointment. The host rubs his chin thoughtfully, shifting uncomfortably in his chair. Shaking his head, he raises his eyebrows and fixes a penetrating gaze on Jamal. The audience erupts to their feet, full of energy and enthusiasm, cheering loudly. The director and his assistants beam with wide smiles, pleased with the unfolding drama. The host rises from his seat, breaking into an exuberant dance. He condescendingly pats Jamal on the back of his head. Then, he casts a glare towards the director off-stage. The director responds with a cheerful thumbs-up, signaling approval. Maintaining a grim and serious demeanor, the host briefly allows a smile to flicker across Jamal’s face as he himself grins stiffly, trying to maintain composure. Backstage, the host waits impatiently for Jamal to depart the stage area. Jamal turns to follow the host down the narrow corridor. With a sudden gesture, the host slaps him on the back and grips him firmly by the shoulder as a sign of control. Two policemen are positioned right outside the door. They cover Jamal’s head with a blanket, effectively concealing his identity from onlookers. The director approaches the host with intent, ready to discuss the next steps. The policemen swiftly bundle Jamal into an awaiting vehicle. Srinivas is seated at the wheel, prepared and ready to drive. At the police station, both the inspector and Jamal sip leisurely on glasses of milky tea together, a brief moment of calm amid the chaos.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: She raises her gaze towards the elevated walkway, catching sight of Jamal, and a smile naturally spreads across her face. In a sudden turn of events, Jamal's attention is drawn to the platform where he observes Salim and two men sprinting purposefully towards Latika, their presence causing an immediate reaction. Quickly assessing the situation, Jamal gestures earnestly behind Latika to avert her attention. She turns, spotting Salim, and instinctively dashes onto a train that stands waiting to depart. In a swift and intense moment, Salim catches up with her, yanking her fiercely off the train by gripping her hair, his expression twisted into a grimace as he spots Jamal urgently descending a nearby flight of stairs. With the assistance of the other men, they forcibly shepherd the trio, jostling them through the dense crowd towards the station's exit. Upon reaching the street, Salim menacingly shoves Latika into a car waiting nearby. Meanwhile, Jamal intently navigates his way through the throng of people, striving to reach Latika in time. Despite Jamal's efforts, by the time he arrives, he witnesses a thug pressing a sharpened blade against Latika's face, a threat palpable in the air. Salim's finger extends towards Jamal in a silent but potent warning. Without hesitation, the thug mercilessly slices the blade across Latika's cheek, casting a triumphant sneer at Jamal, who is pounding on the car window in a futile attempt to intervene. Standing helplessly, Jamal watches as the car accelerates away, weaving into the bustling traffic and leaving him behind. Meanwhile, behind the public scenes, the show's host strides confidently into the restroom. Inside, Jamal remains seated in a stall, concealed from view. The host approaches the urinal, completing his task before exiting the bathroom. Emerging from his solitude, Jamal moves to the sink, running cool water over his hands and letting out a sigh as he grapples with the unfolding events. His reflection stares back from the mirror, and he notices the letter B inscribed in the condensation, a bewildering discovery that leaves his jaw slack. He peers out into the corridor, his expression one of puzzlement, before he makes his way back to the vibrant studio floor. As Jamal re-enters the room, the host regards him with a cunning glance, watching as studio staff guide Jamal to his seat. Settling back into his chair, Jamal fixes his eyes on the host who is now bathed in stage lights, illuminating a seemingly insincere smile. Jamal diverts his attention from the screen and catches sight of the host's malicious grin. Once again, the cryptic condensation message reappears, the host's demeanor shifting abruptly to one of sternness. Jamal shakes his head in silent refusal, repeating the gesture as the host tenses his jaw muscles. The host's expression shifts to one of disappointment, his hand thoughtfully rubbing his chin as he fidgets uncomfortably in his seat. He shakes his head again, eyebrows climbing slightly as he observes Jamal. Meanwhile, the audience rises to their feet, a wave of energy sweeping through them as the director and his assistants share a moment of shared satisfaction, beaming at the unfolding drama. Rising to his feet, the host begins to dance, a performative act that ends with him patronizingly patting Jamal on the back of his head. His gaze flicks to the director off-stage, receiving an enthusiastic thumbs-up in return, though he continues to wear a serious expression. A fleeting smile briefly graces Jamal's face as the host grins tensely. As the show transitions backstage, the host lingers, biding his time for Jamal's exit. Jamal turns, trailing the host down the corridor where he is met with a firm slap on the back and a controlling grip on the shoulder. Outside the room, two policemen stand, ready to intercept Jamal. They swiftly cover his head with a blanket, concealing his identity as they briskly escort him into a waiting vehicle. In the driver's seat, Srinivas sits poised to drive. Arriving at the police station, Jamal finds himself seated across from the inspector, both clasping glasses of milky tea, sharing a moment of tense calm amidst the chaos.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: A fox gazes up at the treetop, spots Rina, and winks. Instantly, Rina observes Tariq and a trio of bears galloping on the rooftop towards Mala. She gestures in front of him. He spots Tariq and leaps onto a hovering spaceship. Tariq catches him and drags him off the spaceship by his tail. He frowns towards Rina flying up a winding ramp. Then, with the other bears, they jostle the quartet through the meadow to the entrance. Tariq shoves Mala into a flying saucer. Rina is still endeavoring to glide her way through the meadows. Rina arrives to witness one beast waving a wand at Mala's ear. Tariq gestures menacingly at Rina. The beast sweeps the wand over his ear. He mocks Rina as he pounds on the saucer portal. Rina watches powerlessly as the saucer zooms off into the breeze. Behind the curtains, the chef strolls into the kitchens. Rina lounges in the pantry. The chef proceeds to the oven. He vacates the kitchens. Rina departs the pantry and moves to the basin to cleanse his paws. He regards himself in the reflection and groans. He perceives at the base of the reflection the digit Z has been etched in the frost. His eyes widen as he peers through the archway. He looks baffled as he heads back to the arena stage. With a sly glance, the chef notices Rina being conducted in by workers. Rina reclines back in his hammock and gazes at the chef. Torches ignite and highlight the chef's fabricated grin. Rina glances up from the panel to witness a wicked smirk on the chef's visage. Yet again, we observe that etched in the frost. The chef's expression solidifies abruptly. Rina shakes his snout. Once more, Rina shakes his snout. The chef clenches his jaw. The chef appears disheartened. The chef strokes his muzzle and shifts uneasily in his hammock. He shakes his snout. With eyebrows lifted, he observes Rina. The spectators rise to their paws. The cameraman and his crew all grin. The chef rises. He twirls. He pats Rina condescendingly on the crown of his snout. Then he glowers at the cameraman backstage. The cameraman gives him a cheerful wave. The chef maintains a stern somber look. A grin surfaces briefly on Rina's face as the chef beams through clenched jaws. Behind the curtains, the chef bides for Rina to exit. Rina pivots to follow the chef through the hallway. He taps him on the dorsal then grasps him by the elbow. Two guards stand beside the archway. They cloak Rina's crown in a hood. The cameraman approaches the chef. The guards hustle Rina into a floating carriage. Amal is steering it. At the guard post, the sheriff and Rina sip creamy smoothies from flasks.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Latika sees Jamal on the walkway and smiles, but Jamal warns her of Salim and two men chasing her. She runs to a train but Salim catches her, pulling her off by her hair. The men force her into a car as Jamal tries to reach her, but a thug slices Latika's face before the car speeds away. Jamal, in a toilet cubicle, discovers the letter B in the condensation. Puzzled, he returns to the studio floor where the host gives him a sly look. Jamal notices the host's fake demeanor as he is led back to his chair. The host dances and pats Jamal patronizingly, while the director signals approval. Despite the host's attempts to maintain a serious face, a fleeting smile appears on Jamal's. Later, backstage, the host leads Jamal down a corridor, greeting him with a back slap as two policemen cover Jamal's head and bundle him into a vehicle driven by Srinivas. At the police station, Jamal sits with the inspector, drinking milky tea.
